lore: Marionettes require careful, regular upkeep to prevent damage from moisture and wood pests.\n\nThe Marionette Hypnotist was the very first of its kind, made to assist in hypnotherapy. But when left loose without clear commands, they cause troubleâ€”people end up doing strange things like trying to unlock tree bark with keys or drinking from shoes.
menagerieDialog: (It hangs limply, awaiting its next command.)
Pull my strings and watch me dance... a dance of death!
I may be controlled, but my mind is my own. Let me share my observations with you.
You can't hurt what isn't truly alive. I am invincible!
(It's jerking about wildly, its limbs flailing in all directions.)
name: Marionette Hypnotist
